name: adhesive
content:

a sticky substance that is used for joining things together, usually permanently: You'll need a strong adhesive to mend that chair. Fill in the gaps with clear silicone adhesive. Synonym
glue
More examplesFewer examplesThis protective metal strip affixes to the edge of the cooker with strong adhesive.The shelves uses both screws and adhesives, making them sturdier.They have created a new polymer coating inspired by the natural adhesive secreted by mussels.
